text: tlk alqisat alty qssnaha ealayk -ayha alrswl- ean nuh waqawmih hi min 'akhbar alghayb alsalft, nuhiha 'ilyk, ma kunt taelamuha 'ant wala qawmuk min qabl hdha albyan, fasbir ealaa takdhib qawmak w'iydhayhm lk, kama sabar al'anbia' min qbl, 'iina aleaqibat altayibat fi aldunya walakhirat lilmutaqin aladhin yakhshawn allh
